attributes.action: A new investigation into the Murders of Hannah Witheridge, David Miller.
attributes.background: Something does not add up, The Burmese workers  were charged at an astounding  rate without any other suspects involved, and they were looking for a third accomplice which is yet to surface.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call for the UK Government or Parliament to take action on something that they are responsible for. These investigations are the responsibility of the authorities in Thailand. If you would like the UK Government to offer assistance to the government of Thailand, or to ask the government of Thailand to take further action, you could start a petition asking for that.
